channel.title: Sellers to sell items on our marketplace
channel.description:
eCommerce sellers such as eBay or Amazon to list and sell a variety of items on our marketplace
NO SELLER FEES! NO LISTING FEES! NO MONTHLY FEES! NO INSERTION FEES! ABILITY TO ACCEPT FIAT OR CRYPTO FOR PAYMENT? KEEP 100% PROFIT?!
Why wouldn't you want to sell your items on our marketplace?!
please email your CV to aletha@bitbay.market our Recruitment Manager.
